full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTZA BA SHES RAB KYI DKA' GNAS CHEN PO BRGYAD KYI BSHAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,'DI DAG GI DON RGYAS PAR LAM GYI RIM PAR GSUNGS ZIN PAS BRJED BYANG DU MA BRIS SO, ,DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GYI GSUNG GI GDAMS PA RNAMS MI NYAMS PA'I PHYIR TU, THEG PA MCHOG GI BRTUL ZHUGS LA GNAS PA'I DGE SLONG DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS BRJED BYANG DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,, ` AOm SVA STI, PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BSTAN YONGS 'DU'I LJON, ,RAB RGYAS 'GRO KUN THAR MCHOG 'BRAS BZANG LA, ,SPYOD PHYIR BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB CHOS GRVA CHER, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED DAL 'GRO'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
